physical_appearance: This is a set of porcelain beaker and saucer. The body of the porcelain wares in this set is white.  Both have similar motifs, decorated with flowering branches and floral sprigs in red, blue and green. The body of both are slightly tiered, with painted scallop-shaped rims.
title_text: A lobed beaker and saucer Lobed porcelain beaker and saucer
subject_terms_2: Porcelain Beakers (Tableware) Kakiemon porcelain Exports Motifs
